record.dc:title: 1HA3 Hixon Village Site 2HA3, Hamilton Co., TN. Trench #3. Feature 12, Post mold pattern in 2HA3. Feature 8, Stone pit in Features 12 and 13, Burial pit. Square 40R12. Direction northwest.
record.wpa:narrative: [Feature 8]: Pit or pile of stones. A few are smooth and stream-worn, but most of them are rough. Some appear to have been hit by plow. [Feature 9]: A small pit or pile of stones, most of them rough. Some may have been scattered by plow as stones are 0.5' below surface. [Feature 12]: House circle. Close to plowline. 1.0 ft. below surface. [Feature 13]: Burial pit. Burial pit was located near what appeared to be center of house circle, about 1.0' below surface of ground. Pit was filled with loose dirt. When small portion of crania was discovered dirt was put back and pit left until vertical cutting can be made.
record.wpa:comments: There are four feature data forms on file for this photograph, one for each feature. Institution has illustration of Feature 12 on file.
